name: Toy Cubes Pop 2019
description:
Toy Cubes Pop 2019 is a match 2 puzzle game with unique gameplay. There are almost 1000 levels in this toy cubes match 2 puzzle. Tap 2 or more blocks of the same color to blast. Your purpose is to remove the blocks as many as possible. Clear away the barriers by eliminating blocks. Following the adventure and start your journey with friends. Blast the blocks and enjoy this adventure filled with cute toys. The best puzzle game will bring you endless fun!

Download it now for free! Enjoy the cheerfulness in Toy Cubes Pop 2019. Internet is not necessary for cube blasting. You can play the game at anywhere anytime and addicted to this toy paradise. We are looking forward to you to challenge!


[HOW TO PLAY TOY CUBES POP 2019]
- Tap on any 2 or more adjacent blocks of the same to blast
- Tap 5 or more adjacent blocks of the same color to generate special bomb or blaster for huge explosions to blast your way
- Powerful bombs can help you solve puzzles easily

[THE FEATURES OF TOY CUBES POP 2019]
- Cute character to keep you company on your adventure
- Leaderboards to compete with players all over the world
- Addictive gaming experience that can share with friends
- Over 1000 levels, easy and fun to play but challenging to fully master 
- A puzzle game that will relax your brain
- Play anytime without internet & WIFI 
- Brand new play game with amazing screen, quality graphic and vision effects.
